Package org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RendererPlugin
    Interface for page renderer plug-ins that represent a rendering layer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContentHighlightRendererPlugin
    Highlights a content object if the mouse is hovering over it.
    ContentSelectionRendererPlugin
    Renderer plug-in for document page view that highlights the selected content objects with a surrounding rectangle.
    DefaultRenderStyles
    Default content object render styles (for regions, text lines, words and glyphs).
    PageContentRendererPlugin
    Renderer plug-in for document page view that draws the content objects (outline + fill).
    PageRenderer
    Basic renderer for a document page that renders the document image.
    Add renderer plugins for additional layers.
    PolygonRendererHelper
    Simple static helper class to draw a polygon on a canvas.
    SelectionFocusRendererPlugin
    Page view rendering layer that greys out the area around the currently selected page object.
